Summary: 10-20 orbs in 2,2 formation and a 4 formation
divs: sighting detailson the evening of the 1st of august we where at my brothers house on rockhill road mountsorrel leicestershire having a family bbq at approximately 10.30 \22.30 hundred hours we all spoted a round orb shaped light in the sky we all thought is was a meterite but it was soon followed by another of the same shape and size at what seemed to be a 45 degree angle between them ,as thay passed a plane seamed to cross ther path and was above them so putting them at about a thousend feet . a few second,s later two more in the same formation and then a four formation a few seconds later and then the formation repeated them selfs two two formations and then a four ,and then a single orb on it own much brighter and moving a higher speed seemed to be in the the rear of the formation and on a centre line to the others . the orbs all heading in the same direction and not one broke formation and they all faded into cload at the same time .there was no wind at the time and no rain but after they passed it started to rain heavy as the last large orb went out of sight to the east in the direction of loughborough leicestershire ,i found this sighting very strange as there was no noise and each orb was moving at a set speed and was not floating because they all seemed to keep perfect time and did not seem at the mearsy of the elements . this was all recorded on video and on looking at the recording on close up the orbs seemed like golf balls with flatened tops. i dont beleve in little green men but this i have never seen before and was told that it was chinese latterns with i dont beleave as the direction they came is wooded and i have never seen laterns in mountsorrel in 30 years nor has my parents ,i dont have a answer i just know this was no aircraft i know and thought you might be interested as it fit the pattern of resent sighting around the uk. thanks for lisening
